title: i got disconnected unexpectedly and got low priority queue penalty
body: so i had to logout and relogin to reconnect into the game.. i was active since then, and i got 5x20minute penalty... isn't this unfair?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Leaving or afk'ing from a single game will not yield a penalty, however leaving/afk'ing multiple games over a short period of time *will*.

You can read more about the leaverbuster system [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)
